attributes.action: force Zeeshan Maqbool, of Stanmore, in providing good quality Ladoos for the Contemplation Room community, which he so boldly promised before the Ireland-Pakistan World Cup game, in the event of an Irish victory.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As Ireland beat Pakistan, Zeeshan should provide Ladoos for his fellow colleagues. There are no excuses.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
